source_data.description: Play piano: In this course, you'll embark on an exciting musical journey, Learn essential techniques, music theory, and masterpieces that will help you play piano with confidence and expressiveness.

lessons.title: All the basic piano chords in one epic tutorial
How to work out the chords to a song on the piano

Two chord piano improvisation exercise

A close look at some piano comps
